name: Meme Messenger
description:
Description

Battle your way to the top and become the ultimate Meme Lord in Meme Messenger! 

Face CPU opponents in meme battles that use a rock-paper-scissors system consisting of three types of memes. Winning a battle will earn you a new meme for your arsenal, and as you collect memes, you'll engage in increasingly longer battles. You can also have meme-worthy conversations with your opponents by texting them.

This game was developed as a part of the VGDC Spring 2020 Game Jam in Unity. The theme was "Interface." It is playable on Android devices.

Game Instructions
  • To face a new opponent, tap the "Add Contact" button in the top right corner
  • To start a match, type and send the message "Start!" to an opponent
  • To take your turn, tap a meme at the bottom of the screen to send it
  • WIN CONDITIONS
    • Reaction Meme beats Text Meme
    • Text Meme beats Deep Fried Meme
    • Deep Fried Meme beats Reaction Meme
